item.title: Kate Winslet Finds Herself in a Christmas Crisis in First Look at Her Directorial Debut ‘Goodbye June’
item.description: The first images from Kate Winslet’s directorial debut “Goodbye June” have been revealed. The film will release in select theaters on Dec. 12, and will premiere on Netflix on Dec. 24. The film centers
